long_description: Well-suited to mellow paths and city streets, our Novara Corsa men's bike puts you in a natural upright position to enjoy your surroundings in comfort. Relaxed design places the rider fully upright, optimizing comfort and steering control as well as visibility in every direction. Low-rise mustache handlebar offers a comfortable, natural position for hands. Rigid chromoly fork provides a smooth and dependable ride. The 24 gears are intuitively simple to use thanks to twist shifters; high-to-low gearing makes getting around hardly any effort at all. Easy-handling 700c wheels with combo tread tires help you zip you quickly down the promenade or campus path. Accommodates fenders for protection from wet conditions and a rear rack for increased load carrying options (fenders and rack not included). Kickstand keeps bike upright for hassle-free parking and storage. Specs on our Novara Corsa bike are subject to change.
